channel.title: [PI] I need help!
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make a ::givedonator command to anyone! On Project Infinity!

item.title: [PI] I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Sexy-Vampire Sexy-Vampire
item.description:
@Sexy-Vampire wrote:

if you have donater set up have you try ed garbing the command out of a delta and fixing the errors the pi gives you for that command ?

i dont have donation system set up on my pi yet so havent need to make command sorry

this is out of a delta i dont have running gl and hopes this helps abit

[code] if (command.startsWith(“makedonator”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“OwnersName”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(12);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list.”);
p.savegame(true);
p.disconnected = true;
yell(""+p.playerName+" has just bought membership!");
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}
[/code]

Read full topic
